item.description:
Join fellow Members and Guests of the South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group for a fun Sunday gathering for some DIM SUM at China Pearl in Quincy. DIM SUM consists of a variety of dumplings, steamed dishes and other goodies. The China Peal is located in the Kam Man Mall. Doris will be giving some assistance on ordering DIM SUM as well as some background history on DIM SUM.

See reviews on yelp by clicking on the following link. Yelp Reviews for China Pearl

The price range is $$ Moderate $11.00 -$30.00.

This will be a great opportunity to meet and get to know each other, as well as talk about different foods, restaurants, and meals we enjoy. This will also be a great time to plan our next Dining Out event.

This restaurant does not take reservations - So all that are attending must be prompt for us to be seated.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Brunch @ China Pearl
Sunday, January 24th, 2010 @ 11:30am
237 Quincy Ave
Quincy, MA 02169
617-773-9838
http://www.chinapearl...

Meeting Location: Outside the front door if it's nice out. We will then go in together as a Group. Otherwise, inside the Lobby. If you arrive after we are seated the reservation is under "Jeanne" and "Janet."

Event Organizer(s): Jeanne, Janet, and Doris

Min/Max: Min of 6 people 48 hours in advance. Max of 12 people.

Guests: None. This event is for Members Only.

Fees: Annual Members - FREE, Group Members - $2, Guests - $2

RSVP Deadline: 10AM on Saturday, January 23rd. Any changes made after this time may not be seen by an Event Organizer. Changes to No after this time will be considered No-Shows per our guidelines on the About Us page.

Cash Only Policy: Please bring cash! Paying for all of our meals in cash has been SSDOMG'S policy for over three years. It allows us to avoid the confusion of having the waitstaff run multiple credit card slips and generally helps to keep things simpler for everyone.

Inclement Weather: TBD - Please see our Weather policy on the About page (scroll to the bottom and click on "Weather").

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Directions:

Will be posted the week before the event.
item.how_to_find_us: Meet outside the Front Door. Late arrivals should ask the host for "Jeanne or Janet."

group.name: The South Shore Dining Out Meetup Group

item.name: Join us for DIM SUM at the China Pearl!
